text:
I swear I was about to say something deep…
but the thought slipped.
blank screen.
hic!

Today I decided to exist
and I already regret it a little.
but I’m still here.
meh.

You drive me crazy,
and that’s unfair,
because I was trying
to stay calm.

I… I brought you
this torn little bag.
it’s broken,
but it’s yours.

A hug got stuck
in my throat.
don’t ask.
hic!

I was supposed to write
something pretty and poetic,
but nah.
today: meh.

I thought about my other self,
the one who chose sleep that day.
I get it.
I hate that I get it.

I want to say it out loud,
but I’m embarrassed.
listen, nha.
just… listen.

I keep hoping
you can stay there
forever.
even if it sounds insane.

You know…
I want to understand
other people’s happiness.
I really do.

And… I’ll just say it:
let’s go!
let’s start again.
it’ll be beautiful.

I love the days
when I can think like this.
like my chest
isn’t so heavy.

There will be nights
when a rain of words
stings your chest.
and I’ll… stay.

And your heart will cry
and you’ll feel helpless.
I hope I’m there.
even if I’m clumsy.

To hear your heartbeat
knocking at the edge
of a world
I’ve never seen.

A feeling
that never stops shining
sometimes starts
to burn.

Without noticing,
I ended up somewhere unknown.
(sos)
and I don’t know the way back.

Maybe I forgot
what I was trying to do
and missed
something important.

Even if I start forgetting
what mattered,
it’s not your fault.
it’s not mine either :>
